Check the appropriate box below if the Form 8-K filing is intended to simultaneously satisfy the filing obligation of the Registrant under any of the following provisions: &nbsp; &#9744; Written communications pursuant to Rule 425 under the Securities Act (17 CFR 230.425) &nbsp; &#9744; Soliciting material pursuant to Rule 14a-12 under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14a-12) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14d-2(b)) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 13e-4(c) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.13e-4(c)) Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;5.07 Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security Holders. The Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Apple Inc. was held on February&nbsp;13, 2018. At the Annual Meeting, Apple&#146;s shareholders voted on the following six proposals and cast their votes as described below. &nbsp; 1. The individuals listed below were elected at the Annual Meeting to serve as directors of Apple until the next annual meeting of shareholders and until their successors are duly elected and qualified: &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; For &nbsp;&nbsp; Against &nbsp;&nbsp; Abstained &nbsp;&nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote James Bell &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,987,148,171 &nbsp;&nbsp; 32,294,028 &nbsp;&nbsp; 5,382,352 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Tim Cook &nbsp;&nbsp; 3,010,021,984 &nbsp;&nbsp; 11,377,103 &nbsp;&nbsp; 3,425,464 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Al Gore &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,911,462,591 &nbsp;&nbsp; 107,192,677 &nbsp;&nbsp; 6,169,283 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Bob Iger &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,995,925,850 &nbsp;&nbsp; 24,948,214 &nbsp;&nbsp; 3,950,487 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Andrea Jung &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,884,140,327 &nbsp;&nbsp; 136,058,527 &nbsp;&nbsp; 4,625,697 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Art Levinson &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,941,579,110 &nbsp;&nbsp; 78,353,450 &nbsp;&nbsp; 4,891,991 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Ron Sugar &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,981,747,223 &nbsp;&nbsp; 37,432,625 &nbsp;&nbsp; 5,644,703 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Sue Wagner &nbsp;&nbsp; 3,007,708,653 &nbsp;&nbsp; 12,465,761 &nbsp;&nbsp; 4,650,137 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 &nbsp; 2. A management proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst &amp; Young LLP as Apple&#146;s independent registered public accounting firm for 2018 was approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp;&nbsp; Against &nbsp;&nbsp; Abstained &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 4,309,610,294 &nbsp;&nbsp; 64,428,815 &nbsp;&nbsp; 12,473,836 &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 3. An advisory resolution to approve executive compensation was approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp;&nbsp; Against &nbsp;&nbsp; Abstained &nbsp;&nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote 2,861,566,673 &nbsp;&nbsp; 152,738,956 &nbsp;&nbsp; 10,518,822 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 &nbsp; 4. A management proposal to approve the amended and restated Apple Inc. Non-Employee Director Stock Plan was approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp;&nbsp; Against &nbsp;&nbsp; Abstained &nbsp;&nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote 2,913,061,627 &nbsp;&nbsp; 101,747,725 &nbsp;&nbsp; 10,015,099 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 The amended and restated Apple Inc. Non-Employee Director Stock Plan is filed as Exhibit 10.1 hereto. &nbsp; 5. A shareholder proposal entitled &#147;Shareholder Proxy Access Amendments&#148; was not approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp;&nbsp; Against &nbsp;&nbsp; Abstained &nbsp;&nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;961,877,391 &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,025,537,642 &nbsp;&nbsp; 37,409,281 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 &nbsp; 6. A shareholder proposal entitled &#147;Human Rights Committee&#148; was not approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp;&nbsp; Against &nbsp;&nbsp; Abstained &nbsp;&nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;163,401,335 &nbsp;&nbsp; 2,775,484,108 &nbsp;&nbsp; 85,938,871 &nbsp;&nbsp; 1,361,688,394 Item&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits. &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 10.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Apple Inc. Non-Employee Director Stock Plan, as amended and restated as of February&nbsp;13, 2018. SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; Date: February&nbsp;14, 2018 &nbsp; &nbsp; Apple Inc. &nbsp; &nbsp; By: &nbsp; /s/ Katherine Adams &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Katherine Adams &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Senior Vice President, &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; General Counsel
